resources.string: \tThis program allows students to enroll for a college symposium and it\'s workshop. It allows the admin to view the participants and the winners.
\tA simple sign-up and login application with more concentration on the backend rather than the frontend. I\'ve used MySQL for database storage and Nodejs for connecting to the database and used HBS.
\n\u2022Count of each word in a file
\tCounts the number of each word in a file using Hash tables.
\tAn app about me and you are looking right at it.\n\n

\tI\'m a second year undergraduate student pursuing B.E. Computer Science and Engineering.I\'m an aspiring developer.I\'m currently looking for internship opportunities in development and data analytics sector. I have keen interset in core CS topics like ML, data analytics etc.
